claimVerifiedIdentityBadge().details: User must be registered in ScoreRegistry first

claimVerifiedIdentityBadgeWithAutoRegist.details: Auto-registers user if not already registered, then mints badge

params.scoreHash: The score hash for lazy registration

returns._0: The token ID (0 if not owned)

params.minter: The address to grant minter role

params.badgeType: The badge type to check for

returns._0: Whether the user has the badge
Whether the address is a minter

params.badgeType: The type of badge to mint
params.user: The address to mint the badge to

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.minter: The address to revoke minter role

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimVerifiedIdentityBadge().notice: Allows registered users to claim their Verified Identity badge

claimVerifiedIdentityBadgeWithAutoRegist.notice: Claim badge with auto-registration in ScoreRegistry

getBadgeType(uint256).notice: Get the badge type for a token

getBadges(address).notice: Get all badge types owned by a user

getTokenId(address,uint8).notice: Get the token ID for a user's badge

grantMinter(address).notice: Grant minter role to an address

hasBadge(address,uint8).notice: Check if a user has a specific badge type

isMinter(address).notice: Check if an address is a minter

mintBadge(address,uint8).notice: Mint a badge to a user (only callable by minters)

revokeBadge(address,uint8).notice: Revoke a badge from a user (only callable by admin)

revokeMinter(address).notice: Revoke minter role from an address

scoreRegistry().notice: Reference to ScoreRegistry for registration verification

setBaseURI(string).notice: Set the base URI for token metadata

setScoreRegistry(address).notice: Set the ScoreRegistry address for registration verification
